overview: Every gay man's dream: A painter gives Dorian a magical ring that makes him irresistible with a hot body and a long, thick prick. Dorian picks up two rough and big-dicked sailors, who chain him to his bed and mouth his foreskin. Youthful, spry, and horny Dorian drinks deep at the fleshpots, all but devouring a trick who takes Dorian's large hard-on up his ass while licking Dorian's toes. After several other sexcapades, the jealous painter destroys Dorian and his sexual pursuits.
title: The Portrait of Dorian Gay
